==Dialogue==
===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Keqing)
:{{A|vo card keqing invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' Relaxing after work is actually pretty nice.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Keqing's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card keqing ingame easy 02.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' As I anticipated...

;(When the player defeats two of Keqing's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card keqing ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' A slight miscalculation...

;(When Keqing defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card keqing ingame easy 01.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' A marginal advantage.

;(When Keqing uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card keqing ingame easy 04.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' Let's end this!

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card keqing invite easy 02.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' Both victory and defeat are part of the journey.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card keqing invite easy 03.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' Congratulations, you win.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Keqing)
:{{A|vo card keqing invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' I suppose a few games with you won't affect my work.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Keqing's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card keqing ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' ...A bold attack.

;(When the player defeats two of Keqing's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card keqing ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' I need to adjust my strategy.

;(When Keqing defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card keqing ingame hard 01.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' I have the upper hand.

;(When Keqing uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card keqing ingame hard 04.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' It won't be long now!

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card keqing invite hard 02.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' Your efforts deserve recognition.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card keqing invite hard 03.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' I was much too careless.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Guest Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Keqing)
:{{A|vo card keqing freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' Genius Invokation TCG may only be a game for fun, but the strategy element is very real.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG challenge interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::{{A|vo card keqing leave 01.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' Please take care. I should also be getting back to work myself.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card keqing endofgame win 01.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' You can't win every battle. Don't take it to heart.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card keqing endofgame fail 01.ogg}} '''Keqing:''' I will practice more and seize victory next time.
{{Dialogue End}}
